reviewText:
This DVD shows all the cool drag racing at Lions Drag Strip.  Volume 2 shows the
AFX funny cars and how they came on so fast. Plus how top fuel went back to nitro
and the crazy speeds at that time. A good rememberance to all the drivers that lost
there life in these insane rides back in the day.  If you buy volume 2, you better
buy 1 and 3 also.  It tells the story from start to end.

Bought all three editions...This one stops playing and skips...Hubby every disappointed because he loved the others. He grew up going to Lions Drag Strip, so I thought these would be great Christmas gifts....Very disappointed in this one and as it had been opened and played we could not return...
Used for teaching Drag Racing to a class.
It was exactly what I wanted and arrived before I thought it would.
One of the best documentaries i have seen in yrs. This will bring back the memories.

If you know anything about drag racing or perhaps want to know some history about this lifestyle (not sport in my opinion) this is a great addition to your collection. The filmography is a bit fuzzy, but the story is still appealing today.
Highly recommended for any drag racing history fan. Unbelievable that there was so much content about one of the greatest tracks of all time.
He loved it!  He's a racer from back in the day and this is the kind of thing he loves.

I first went to Lions Drag Strip in 1958. I raced my street cars there from 1961 until about 1965. This video, one of 3 that tell the entire Lions story, is the middle one and my favorite. It confirms my memories and reminds of some I had forgotten. I'm proud to have this in my collection. Thanks.

Excellant coverage of the first days of LADS.
Having grown up at that strip it was fun to see it againe and share it with my kids and grandkids!
